content.rendered:
Our Recent Case Studies

We love what we do and are proud to share our work with you!
Explore Case Studies

our portfolio

Recent projects

Here’s a selection of our recent projects across the digital landscape.

  • Branding
  • Web Design
  • Pitch Decks
  • Marketing
  • SEO

Howden Group Holdings

Branding

We focused on creating a brand that was modern, easy to understand and eye-catching, developing a visual identity to evoke feelings of security, peace of mind, and affordability.
Read the Case Study

Vivienne Westwood

BRANDING & WEB DESIGN

We joined forces with the iconic British designer, Vivienne Westwood, to launch her revolutionary new non-profit, “The Vivienne Foundation”. Our work went down so well that we are now partnering to create the foundation website. Watch this space!

Read the Case Study

Artisan

BRANDING & WEB DESIGN

Artisans are trained on a plethora of unique data to customize them to their role and your sector & company, and to improve their capability & reliability.
Read the Case Study

Nova Project Studio

BRANDING

To visually represent the nova concept, we used the delta symbol from the Greek alphabet as the “A” in the logo. The uppercase delta (Δ) symbolises change or the change in mathematics, which aligns with the nature of the firm.
Read the Case Study

Newflame

BRANDING

While the world has tired of Tinder and grown bored with Bumble, newflame is shaking up the dating app industry. They connect users to double dates, and offer an all-in-one date booking solution as an alternative to the stagnant online dating world. We created branding that matched their ambition.

Read the Case Study

Vivienne Westwood

BRANDING & WEB DESIGN

We joined forces with the iconic British designer, Vivienne Westwood, to launch her revolutionary new non-profit, “The Vivienne Foundation”. Our work went down so well that we are now partnering to create the foundation website. Watch this space!

Read the Case Study

Limber

WEB DESIGN

To create the best website possible, our team began by working closely with limber to understand their mission: to make it easy, cost-effective and viable for hospitality venues to access and work with a growing generation of flexible talent.
Read the Case Study

Inter.link

WEB DESIGN

From there, we designed a website that was easy to navigate and had a modern, visually-appealing design that reflected Inter.link’s focus on security and sustainability.
Read the Case Study

Fairford Medical

WEB DESIGN​

We designed a new website that effectively communicates the key features and benefits of Fairford Medical’s imaging solutions and services, as well as the company’s commitment to providing customised solutions for specific customer needs.
Read the Case Study

Artisan

BRANDING & WEB DESIGN

Artisans are trained on a plethora of unique data to customize them to their role and your sector & company, and to improve their capability & reliability.
Read the Case Study

Convivia

WEB DESIGN​

We love working with companies that give back to the community. Convivia is an industry-leading proptech investment firm, committed to empowering low-income tenants through providing quality, affordable homes.

Read the Case Study
Projects Coming Soon

Cogency Global

MARKETING

We optimised their website for search engines to increase their visibility and drive more traffic. Additionally, we managed their social media accounts and implemented a targeted email marketing campaign to reach their target audience and generate leads.
Read the Case Study
Projects Coming Soon
